statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Rift Valley coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.60} per pound with some Costa Rican coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.80} per pound to create \displaystyle{20} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${12.03} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
